name: Eason
description:
Eason found himself awaked from nightmare. He found a letter left for him and started his own pace to find the answer. Who am I and where should I leave for ? Pick all the items you may need and helped Eason to go through all the mystery.
Please be aware of the hints that appeared in the scene and enjoyed the game !

Game Features:
• Well-designed Setting – Explore Eason's world inspired by masterpiece furniture, complex architecture and stylish statue from Eason's inner psyche.
• Unexpected Horror – A sense of horror means each step you take will matter and some puzzles or objects will suddenly show up on your way.
• Adventurous Exploration – By exploring the environment you will discover the details of the dark space and cryptic message.
• Dark and Classic art –In a very mysterious space, occasionally, the world with combining surrealist elements and macabre scenes is waiting for you.
